name: Working the Register [Unrated]
description:
Description

You work as a cashier at a restaurant, give the exact right amount of change, take their orders, and give them out
Taking a bit to get their order done? Talk a little, happy customers are patient customers.

Current Version: 2.0
New: Save-System, scoreboard, arrows for moving left and right.
Updated: Better difficulties, updated conversations with customers.
Patches: Fixed customers not paying enough, therefore, ruining runs.

Coming in Future
  • Menu with a calendar and your current hourly pay
  • Conversations with customers (story-mode only)
  • Save-System (getting fired sends you back a week, or you can restart)
Tutorial

IMPORTANT: Any money on the counter (fully visible cash and coins) will go back to the customer once you click 'End Transaction', and all money the customer pays will go onto the counter too (so make sure to put it all away first!)

You can click the arrow at mid-right or mid-left of the screen to move either way. At the moment, the only thing you can do in the second area is to change your initials (for the scoreboard).

Coins
  • Left-Click one of the faded coins to take one out
  • Left-Click a coin on the counter to drag
  • Right-Click to place in cash-register
  • Middle-Click to place in the personal wallet (for tips in future versions)
Cash
  • Left-Click to add a bill
  • Right-Click to remove a bill
Values

  • Personal Money: Your money you can spend in future versions
  • Cash Register: How much money is in the cash register
  • Money Owed: How much the customer owes
  • Money Paid: How much the customer paid
  • Extra Change: How much error in money you've made (negative means you didn't give enough change, positive means you gave too much)
  • Line Length: How many people are in the line
  • Time: How long you've spent with the current customer
